name: Wacko Birds: The Free Draw Revolution Begins
name_original: Wacko Birds: The Free Draw Revolution Begins
description:
Wacko Birds is an arcade/puzzle game with a very unique gameplay in a beautifully painted world. Swipe, tap, or flick your finger to create paddles, barriers, slopes, slides or anything else you can draw or doodle to help your Wacko Bird fly through the air to complete its tasks.

Help the Wacko Birds free their caged friends and liberate the WackoLands from the control of the Vultures.

The beautiful WackoLands have been taken over by the tyrannical Vultures. Oppressed, robbed, and imprisoned in their once free lands, a small group of Wacko Birds are determined to fight back! Join the Wacko Birds in their amazing fight to restore the freedoms and liberties they once enjoyed. Complete increasingly difficult levels and rise in rank as you too become a proud Wacko Bird!

Key features:
• 5 WackoLands with 90 Levels
• Innovative gameplay
• Beautiful graphics
• Awesome Power ups
• Collect Golden Eggs
• 3 super speed modes - Normal Mode, Lightning Mode, Beast Mode
• Easy to learn, hard to master
• New and challenging obstacles in each WackoLand
• Continue level play using accumulated WB Coins
• Integrated Twitter and Facebook capabilities
